Blog Section with Articles.Layout: Centered text header followed by a grid layout for the articles.
Blog Section with Articles.Design: Clean and organized with a focus on readability. Each article features a small image, title, date, and a short description.

Key Elements.Header: Centered with a bold title and supportive text.
Key Elements.Article Grid: Displayed in a responsive grid layout with gaps between the articles.
Key Elements.Article Image: Small, rounded, and positioned above or beside each article.
Key Elements.Article Title: Bold and prominent, linked for further reading.
Key Elements.Article Date: Displayed in a smaller font above the title.
Key Elements.Read More Link: Prominent link encouraging readers to continue reading.

Blog Section with Articles.Use Cases: Ideal for blogs, news websites, or any content-heavy site looking to showcase multiple articles in a clean, organized manner.
